our_goal: Our goal is effective solution of any tasks related to the delivery of goods of different nature.
company_desc: Transport-forwarding company has been operating since 2023 and is engaged in international cargo transportation by the following types of transport: road, rail, multimodal and air transportation.
company_spec: Our company specializes in transportation of various cargoes to different destinations, including Russia, Belarus, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Armenia, Afghanistan, Iraq and Turkey, as well as the countries of the European Union.
footer_description: A brief description of your company or service
